quest.name: Forget Us Not
journal: Alisaie has only one thing on her mind.
objectives: Speak with Alisaie at Maelstrom Command.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Alas, the Ironworks crew couldn't linger longâ”€far too much to do. Yet brief though our time together was, it was bloody good to see them!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At long last, we have our cure...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: In theory, at any rate. We cannot be certain until such time as we put it to the proof, but I am quietly confident.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, if we're to test it on someone, then I suggest Ga Bu. His symptoms are relatively mild.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It'll be fine, I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: As long as you exercise due caution...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Yes. As long as we exercise due caution, it will be fine.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Without further ado, then, let's make for Limsa. We've kept Ga Bu waiting long enough!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I doubt I could contribute much towards what comes next, so I shall cheer you on from afar. Best of luck with the treatment.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: We'll all be praying for your success!

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: 'Tis plain Alisaie is very fond of Ga Bu. To the extent that I have a hand in it, I shall do all in my power to bring him back.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, this is the moment of truth. I'll have our hosts bring Ga Bu to us at once.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Alisaie will succeed, I am certain of it. We need but have faith.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, this seems as good a spot as any to have a rest.
